Changelog
=========

0.2 (2011/11/16)
----------------

- add AlchemyApi
- get tags asynchronsously via AJAX
- comment out rarely used api methods to reduce clutter
- ommit tags that are already assigned as keywords
- add terms of use for webservices


0.1 (2011/02/22)
----------------
- initial release
- Created recipe with ZopeSkel
